name: VEDP GIS Open Data
description: A geospatial data catalog provided by the Virginia Economic Development Partnership, including datasets on community college system regions, Planning District Commissions, and other economic and regional planning data.

geotopics.name: Planning District Commissions
geotopics.description: Information on which Planning District Commission (PDC) each locality belongs to. PDCs are voluntary associations of local governments.

geotopics.name: VEDP Marketing Regions
geotopics.description: Virginia Community College System (VCCS) regions and the territory each covers.
